message.content:
{"id": "19089", 
 "title": "Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)",
 "description": "Bug 19089No popup menu java editor ruler (Photon)",
 "OB": "When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a menu should appear to allow users to add breakpoints/marks. However, in Photon, this menu does not appear.",
 "EB": "To reproduce the issue:\n1) Open a Java editor.\n2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.\nExpected behavior: A menu should appear to add breakpoints/marks, etc.\nActual behavior: The menu does not appear.",
 "SR": "Fix the issue causing the popup menu to not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor."}

origin.input_content:
